name: The Ultimate Chicken Toaster
description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Chicken Toaster (aka the Temple of Fire) !

You easily made your way to the treasure room thanks to your shiny fireproof armor of doom. The chest at the center of the room contains the most powerful item in the world ! THE ULTIMATE CHICKEN ! However be aware that it is really beakable. To finish your mission you must keep it alive through the toasty dungeon.

Controls :

WASD / Left Joystick : Move

Left Clic / A(Pad) / X (Pad) : Attack

Right Clic / B(Pad) / Y (Pad): Grab / Throw item
